001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marks a class as participating in the <b>Decorator</b> design pattern.
007 * <p>
008 * The Decorator is a structural design pattern that allows behavior to be
009 * added to individual objects, dynamically or statically, without modifying
010 * their class. A decorator:
011 * <ul>
012 *   <li>Implements the same interface as the component it decorates.</li>
013 *   <li>Wraps (composes) a reference to another component instance.</li>
014 *   <li>Delegates operations to the wrapped component, while adding
015 *       extra responsibilities before or after delegation.</li>
016 * </ul>
017 */
018@Documented
019@DesignPattern(DesignPattern.Category.STRUCTURAL)
020@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
021@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
022public @interface Decorator {
023}
